nodes.text: Wehttam was a planet located within the Wehttam system of the Core Worlds. Wehttam was the Wehttam homeworld. It was located in the Farlax sector.
Located on the Widek Bypass, the planet joined the New Republic for protection from the Yevetha. The Wehttam and the Fian later betrayed the Yevetha to the Yuuzhan Vong.
